lead_paragraph: OKRENT--Shirley R. Age 91, at home in Manhattan, on April 3, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Meyer. Devoted mother of Diane, Daniel and Russell. Loving mother-in-law of Aaron Shelden, Pauline Andrews and Susan Rock Okrent. Adored and adoring grandmother of Victor Shelden, Rachel and Rebecca Okrent. Cherished sister of Maurice Rieff and the late Bea, Sam, Rosetta, and Edward. Devoted sister-in-law. Much loved Aunt Shirley to many. Registered Nurse and Certified Nurse-Midwife. Recognized pioneer in her field. Longtime resident of Wantagh, NY. Service Tuesday, April 5, 2:00pm at Riverside Memorial Chapel, Amsterdam Avenue and 76th Street. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OKRENT, SHIRLEY R
